text: Tum logon ke rang dhang wahi hain jo tumhare pesh-rawon ke thay, woh tumse zyada zorawar aur tumse badhkar maal aur aulad waley thay, phir unhon ne duniya mein apne hissey ke mazey loot liye aur tumne bhi apne hissey ke mazey isi tarah loote jaise unhon ne loote thay, aur waisi hi behason (arguments) mein tum bhi padey jaisi behason mein woh padey thay. So unka anjaam yeh hua ke duniya aur aakhirat mein unka sab kiya dhara zaya ho gaya aur wahi khasarey mein hain
